_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_createBulletedListForUCFClauses
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
"<w:p w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidP=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRDefault=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w14:paraId=" & char(34) & "00000005" & char(34) & ">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
                    
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:after=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:afterAutospacing=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
                <w:ind w:left=" & char(34) & "720" & char(34) & " w:hanging=" & char(34) & "360" & char(34) & "/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val=" & char(34) & "none" & char(34) & "/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & ">
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & " w:cs=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & " w:eastAsia=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & " w:hAnsi=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & "/>
                    <w:color w:val=" & char(34) & "222222" & char(34) & "/>
                    <w:sz w:val=" & char(34) & "21" & char(34) & "/>
                    <w:szCs w:val=" & char(34) & "21" & char(34) & "/>
                    <w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space=" & char(34) & "preserve" & char(34) & ">" & ri!bulletedText & "</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>"

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_defineHeadingforDocument
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*headingText: The text to be shown as heading.
headingType: The heading type value which determines the size of the heading Heading1, Heading2, Heading3*/

"<w:p w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & 
"00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidP=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRDefault=" 
& char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" 
& char(34) & " w14:paraId=" & char(34) & "00000004" & char(34) & "><w:pPr><w:pStyle w:val=" 
& char(34) & ri!headingType & char(34) & "/><w:rPr/></w:pPr>"&
"<w:r w:rsidDel=" 
& char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" 
& char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & "><w:rPr><w:rtl w:val=" 
& char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/></w:rPr><w:t xml:space=" & char(34) & "preserve" 
& char(34) & ">" & ri!headingText & "</w:t></w:r></w:p>"

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_docxLineBreak

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_getClauseSetClauseTextsWithQuerySelection

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel

_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_dynamicTableInClauseText
_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!row: index(ri!formattedList, ri!index, {}),
  local!newRows: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!row.table,
    expression: if(
      toboolean(fv!item.isNewRow) = true,
      true,
      null
    )
  ),
  local!rowIndex: where(local!newRows),
  local!noOfColumns: if(
    count(local!rowIndex) <= 1,
    1,
    local!rowIndex[2] - local!rowIndex[1]
  ),
  local!textArrays: rule!AS_GCM_UT_groupTableRowDataIntoArray(
    list: index(ri!formattedList, ri!index, {})
  ),
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
      index(
        index(local!row.table, 1, {}),
        "caption",
        {}
      )
    ),
    "",
    "</w:p><w:p w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidP=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRDefault=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w14:paraId=" & char(34) & "00000019" & char(34) & ">
<w:pPr>
<w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & "center" & char(34) & "/>
<w:rPr/>
</w:pPr>
<w:r w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & ">
<w:rPr>
<w:color w:val=" & char(34) & "777777" & char(34) & "/>
<w:sz w:val=" & char(34) & "21" & char(34) & "/>
<w:szCs w:val=" & char(34) & "21" & char(34) & "/>
<w:highlight w:val=" & char(34) & "white" & char(34) & "/>
<w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
</w:rPr>
<w:t xml:space=" & char(34) & "preserve" & char(34) & ">" & index(
      index(local!row.table, 1, {}),
      "caption",
      {}
    ) & "</w:t>
</w:r>
<w:r w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & ">
<w:rPr>
<w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
</w:rPr>
</w:r>
</w:p>"
  ) & "<w:tbl>" & rule!AS_GCM_UT_insertTablePropertiesForClauseTextTable(
    noOfColumns: local!noOfColumns
  ) & concat(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: { local!textArrays },
      expression: rule!AS_GCM_UT_insertTableRowForClauseTextTables(texts: fv!item)
    )
  ) & "</w:tbl>"
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CPS_clauseSetDetailsForClauseSet
AS_GCM_UT_insertTableHeaderCells
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!width: 3116,
  "<w:tc><w:tcPr><w:tcW w:w=" & char(34) & local!width & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "dxa" & char(34) & "/><w:tcBorders><w:top w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/><w:bottom w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/><w:left w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/><w:right w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/></w:tcBorders></w:tcPr><w:p>
<w:pPr><w:spacing w:after=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>" & "<w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & "center" & char(34) & " />" & "<w:rPr>
<w:b w:val=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & "/>
</w:rPr></w:pPr>

<w:r><w:rPr>
<w:b w:val=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & "/>
<w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
</w:rPr><w:t>" & ri!text & "</w:t></w:r></w:p></w:tc>"
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_findColorCodes

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The modifierMaps should have the below structure
{
a!map(
field: <The field which needs to be modified>,
find: Optional when findRegex is provided - The value to find,
findRegex: Optional when find is provided - The regex search performed to replace the value,
replaceWith: The value to replace with. When left blank the find values will be removed,
instanceNum: The instance number to which replace. Use only when the find is passed,
replaceAllInstances: Default true - Determines whether all the instances need to be replaced
applyWhen: When false this map will be skipped
),
...
}
*/
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!modifierMaps),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!data,
    expression: reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer(data: _, modifierMap: _),
      fv!item,
      ri!modifierMaps
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_extractBalancedTagThatHasGivenText

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_clauseTextOoxmlElements
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!isNewParagraph = true(),
  "</w:p><w:p>
<w:pPr>" & if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!headingType),
    "",
    "<w:pStyle w:val=" & char(34) & ri!headingType & char(34) & "/>"
  ) & if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!alignment),
    "",
    "<w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & if(
      find("justify", ri!alignment) <> 0,
      "both",
      if(find("center", ri!alignment) <> 0,
      "center",
      if(find("right", ri!alignment) <> 0, "right", "left"))) & char(34) & "/>"
  ) & if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!indent),
    "",
    "<w:ind w:left=" & char(34) & 720 * (ri!indent - 1) & char(34) & " w:firstLine=" & char(34) & 720 & char(34) & "/>"
  ) & if(
    or(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!bulletedList)),
    "",
    "<w:numPr> 
<w:ilvl w:val=" & char(34) & ri!bulletedList & char(34) & "/>
</w:numPr><w:ind w:left=" & char(34) & 720 * (ri!bulletedList + 1) & char(34) & " w:hanging=" & char(34) & "360" & char(34) & "/>"
  ) & /*& "<w:spacing w:after=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:lineRule=" & char(34) & "auto" & char(34) & "/>*/
  "</w:pPr>",
  ""
) & "<w:r w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & ">
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & " w:cs=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & " w:eastAsia=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & " w:hAnsi=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & "/>" & if(
  ri!isBold,
  "<w:b w:val=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & "/>",
  ""
) & if(
  ri!isItalic,
  "<w:i w:val=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & "/>",
  ""
) & if(
  ri!isStrike,
  "<w:strike w:val=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & "/>",
  ""
) & "<w:color w:val=" & char(34) & if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!textColor),
  "222222",
  ri!textColor
) & char(34) & "/>" & "<w:sz w:val=" & char(34) & if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!headingType),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_getFontSizeByHeadingType(headingType: ri!headingType),
  if(
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!fontSize),
      ri!fontSize = 0
    ),
    21,
    ri!fontSize
  )
) & char(34) & "/>" & "<w:szCs w:val=" & char(34) & if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!headingType),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_getFontSizeByHeadingType(headingType: ri!headingType),
  if(
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!fontSize),
      ri!fontSize = 0
    ),
    21,
    ri!fontSize
  )
) & char(34) & "/>" & if(
  ri!isUnderline,
  "<w:u w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>",
  ""
) & "<w:shd w:fill=" & char(34) & if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!backgroundColor),
  "auto",
  ri!backgroundColor
) & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "clear" & char(34) & "/>" & "<w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>" & "</w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space=" & char(34) & "preserve" & char(34) & ">" & ri!text & "</w:t></w:r>"
                & if(
  ri!endParagraphTag = true(),
  "</w:p><w:p>",
  ""
)

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
      input: index(ri!data, ri!modifierMap.field, null)
    ),
    ri!modifierMap.applyWhen
  ),
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    ri!data,
    ri!modifierMap.field,
    a!match(
      value: ri!modifierMap,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find)
      ),
      then: error(
        "Only one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
      then: if(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum),
        error(
          "instanceNum should be null when passing a value to findRegex"
        ),
        regexreplaceall(
          ri!modifierMap.findRegex,
          ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
          ri!modifierMap.replaceWith
        )
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find),
      then: rule!AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce(
        text: ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
        find: ri!modifierMap.find,
        replaceWith: ri!modifierMap.replaceWith,
        instanceNum: ri!modifierMap.instanceNum,
        replaceAllInstances: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!modifierMap.replaceAllInstances,
          default: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum)
        )
      ),
      default: error(
        "Alteast one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      )
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

0002e660-572e-8000-19e5-7f0000014e7a.name: AS GCM Generated Clause Set Documents

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_insertTableCell
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!width: 3116,
  "<w:tc><w:tcPr><w:tcW w:w=" & char(34) & local!width & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "dxa" & char(34) & "/><w:tcBorders><w:top w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/><w:bottom w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/><w:left w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/><w:right w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/></w:tcBorders></w:tcPr><w:p><w:pPr><w:spacing w:after=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>" & "<w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & "center" & char(34) & " />" & "</w:pPr><w:r><w:t>" & rule!AS_GCM_UT_encodeSpecialCharactersToXML(
    text: ri!text,
    preserveWords: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_PRESERVE_WORDS_FOR_SPL_CHAR_ENCODING
  ) & "</w:t></w:r></w:p></w:tc>"
)

_a-0000ed5b-ded3-8000-9df2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseSetRelatedActionPlaceholder
_a-0000ed5b-ded3-8000-9df2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!bundle,
    default: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null())
  ),
  {
    if(
      ri!isSmallDialog,
      {},
      {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          marginAbove: "EVEN_MORE",
          marginBelow: "EVEN_MORE"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          marginAbove: "EVEN_MORE",
          marginBelow: "EVEN_MORE"
        )
      }

    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(
        document: cons!AS_GCM_DOC_CLAUSE_SET_GENERATION_STATE
      ),
      size: "SMALL_PLUS",
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: if(ri!isSmallDialog, "NONE", "EVEN_MORE"),
      marginBelow: "STANDARD"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: "Clause Set Generation is in progress",
        size: if(ri!isSmallDialog,"STANDARD","MEDIUM")
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: "LESS",
      marginBelow: "LESS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        size: if(ri!isSmallDialog,"SMALL",""),
        text: "This action will be available once the clause set generation is complete"
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      marginBelow: "STANDARD"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(
      buttons: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          label: "Close",
          icon: "close",
          value: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL,
          saveInto: ri!userAction,
          submit: true,
          size: "SMALL",
          style: "SOLID",
          color: "SECONDARY"
        )
      },
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: "STANDARD",
      marginBelow: if(ri!isSmallDialog, "NONE", "EVEN_MORE")
    )
  }
)

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_addClausesTableToDocument

AS_CO_UT_queryEntity

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_sortArray

_a-0000e6ec-ba89-8000-9be2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_filterClauseSetClauseByFormat

_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_sortArrayDistinct

_a-0000e69a-ff03-8000-9bd0-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_determineHeadingType
_a-0000e69a-ff03-8000-9bd0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!headingTag: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!headingTag,
    expression: if(
      contains(
        { "h1", "h2", "h3", "h4", "h5", "h6" },
        fv!item
      ),
      fv!item,
      null
    )
  ),
  local!removeNulls: reject(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: _),
    local!headingTag
  ),
  displayvalue(
    index(local!removeNulls, 1, {}),
    { "h1", "h2", "h3", "h4", "h5", "h6" },
    {
      "Heading1",
      "Heading2",
      "Heading3",
      "Heading4",
      "Heading5",
      "Heading6"
    },
    ""
  )
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_FM_viewDocumentForClauseSet

_a-0000e69a-ff03-8000-9bd0-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_findBulletedLevel
_a-0000e69a-ff03-8000-9bd0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!index: split(ri!tag, ", "),
  local!lvl: count(wherecontains("li", local!index)),
  local!lvl
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectCdtByField

_a-0000e8e8-3f98-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_regexsearch
_a-0000e8e8-3f98-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule is used to handle the weird behaviour seen sometimes in the regexsearch function where the returned data is not indexable or erroring out. 
To fix this we are explicitly casting to make it proper.
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: regexsearch(
    ri!pattern,
    ri!searchString,
    ri!regexFlag,
    ri!returnGroups
  ),
  expression: a!map(
    match: touniformstring(index(fv!item, "match", "")),
    startPosition: tointeger(index(fv!item, "startPosition", null)),
    endPosition: tointeger(index(fv!item, "endPosition", null)),
    groups: rule!AS_CO_UT_castToDictionaryList(index(fv!item, "groups", null))
  )
)

_a-0000e36c-7599-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_primitiveTypeCheckHandler

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_convertHtmlToOoxml
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!text: rule!AS_GCM_UT_removeUnwantedHtmlTagsByRegex(text: ri!text),
  local!split: split(local!text, ">"),
  local!htmlArray: reject(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: _),
    split(local!split, "<")
  ),
  local!list: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!htmlArray,
    expression: if(
      or(
        contains(rule!AS_GCM_CONS_htmlTags(), fv!item),
        find("p style=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("font-size", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("color: rgb(", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("color=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("background-color: rgb(", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("class=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("text-align:", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("a href=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("a target=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("h5", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("font-weight: 700", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("col style=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("<th class=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("span style=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("table", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("td style=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("tr style=", fv!item) <> 0,
        find("th style=", fv!item) <> 0
      ),
      {
        tag: if(
          find(" ", fv!item) <> 0,
          if(
            find("font-weight: 700", fv!item) <> 0,
            "strong",
            left(fv!item, find(" ", fv!item) - 1)
          ),
          if(
            or(
              find("span", fv!item) <> 0,
              find("/", fv!item) <> 0
            ),
            "",
            if(
              find("p style=", fv!item) <> 0,
              "p",
              fv!item
            )
          )
        ),
        text: if(fv!item = "br", "&linebrk", ""),
        endTag: if(find("/", fv!item) <> 0, fv!item, ""),
        color: rule!AS_GCM_UT_findColorCodes(tag: fv!item, isBackgroundColor: false()),
        backgroundColor: if(
          find("background-color: rgb(", fv!item) <> 0,
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_findColorCodes(tag: fv!item, isBackgroundColor: true()),
          ""
        ),
        font: rule!AS_GCM_UT_findFontSize(tag: fv!item),
        bulletedListNum: if(
          find("li", fv!item) <> 0,
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_findBulletedLevel(tag: fv!item),
          if(
            or(
              find("li ", fv!item) <> 0,
              find("/li", fv!item) <> 0
            ),
            1,
            null
          )
        ),
        alignment: if(
          find("text-align:", fv!item) <> 0,
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_getAlignmentTagForDoc(tag: fv!item),
          ""
        ),
        indent: if(
          find("margin-left:", fv!item) <> 0,
          index(
            split(
              mid(fv!item, find("ql-indent-", fv!item), 11),
              "-"
            ),
            3,
            {}
          ),
          ""
        ),
        table: {
          tag: if(
            or(
              contains(
                {
                  "th",
                  "tr",
                  "td",
                  "table",
                  "/th",
                  "/tr",
                  "/td",
                  "/table"
                },
                fv!item
              ),
              find("th class=", fv!item) <> 0
            ),
            if(
              find("th class=", fv!item) <> 0,
              "th",
              fv!item
            ),
            ""
          ),
          text: ""
        }
      },
      {
        tag: "",
        text: /*substitute(fv!item, "     ", "")*/fv!item,
        endTag: "",
        color: "",
        backgroundColor: "",
        font: "",
        bulletedListNum: "",
        alignment: "",
        indent: "",
        table: { tag: "", text: "" }
      }
    )
  ),
  local!parallelTextIndex: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: index(local!list, "text", {}),
    expression: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(fv!item),
      null,
      a!map(text: fv!item, index: fv!index)
    )
  ),
  local!parallelText: reject(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: _),
    local!parallelTextIndex
  ),
  local!formattedList: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!parallelText,
    expression: rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatTheListOfHtmlTagsIntoDictionary(
      text: index(fv!item, "text", {}),
      list: local!list,
      parallelTextIndex: index(fv!item, "index", {}),
      prevTextIndex: index(
        index(local!parallelText, fv!index - 1, {}),
        "index",
        {}
      )
    )
  ),
  local!formatTable: rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatTableIntoOneRow(formattedList: local!formattedList),
  concat(
    "</w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p>",
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: touniformstring(index(local!formatTable, "text", {})),
      expression: substitute(
        substitute(
          substitute(
            rule!AS_GCM_UT_convertHtmlFontAndColorToOoxml(
              list: local!formatTable,
              text: fv!item,
              index: fv!index
            ),
            "<w:p></w:p>",
            ""
          ),
          "<w:p><w:tbl>",
          "<w:tbl>"
        ),
        "</w:tbl></w:p>",
        "</w:tbl>"
      )
    ),
    "</w:p><w:p><w:r><w:t>"
  )
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_encodeSpecialCharactersToXML

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_insertTableProperties
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
= "<w:tblPr>
<w:tblStyle w:val='TableGrid'/>
<w:tblW w:w=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:type="& char(34) & "auto"& char(34) &"/>
<w:tblBorders>
<w:top w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/>
<w:left w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/><w:bottom w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/><w:right w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/><w:insideH w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' v:color='auto'/><w:insideV w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/></w:tblBorders></w:tblPr>
<w:tblGrid>
<w:gridCol w:w=" & char(34) & "3116" & char(34) & "/>
<w:gridCol w:w="  & char(34) & "3116" & char(34) & "/>
<w:gridCol w:w="  & char(34) & "3116" & char(34) & "/>
</w:tblGrid>"

_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_formatTableIntoOneRow

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
          {
            ri!fields,
            index(
              ri!relatedRecordData,
              "relationship",
              null
            )
          }
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshInterval: ri!refreshInterval,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000e6c8-d132-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_findFontSize
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!index: find("font-size", ri!tag),
  local!fontSize: mid(ri!tag, local!index, 15),
  concat(
    tointeger(index(split(local!fontSize, ": "), 2, {})) * 0.75 * 2
  )
)

_a-0000ec0f-9de5-8000-9d75-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_removeHiddenSpanTagsFromHtml

rule!AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce(
  text: ri!text,
  find: rule!AS_GCM_extractBalancedTagThatHasGivenText(
    text: ri!text,
    uniqueTextInTag: "span hidden"
  ),
  replaceAllInstances: true
)

_a-0000e6ec-ba89-8000-9be2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
substitute(
  ri!text,
  "<w:p><w:pPr><w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & "left" & char(34) & "/><w:ind w:left=" & char(34) & "" & char(34) & " w:firstLine=" & char(34) & "720" & char(34) & "/></w:pPr><w:r w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & "><w:rPr><w:rFonts w:ascii=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & " w:cs=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & " w:eastAsia=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & " w:hAnsi=" & char(34) & "Arial" & char(34) & "/><w:color w:val=" & char(34) & "222222" & char(34) & "/><w:sz w:val=" & char(34) & "21" & char(34) & "/><w:szCs w:val=" & char(34) & "21" & char(34) & "/><w:shd w:fill=" & char(34) & "auto" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "clear" & char(34) & "/><w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/></w:rPr><w:t xml:space=" & char(34) & "preserve" & char(34) & "></w:t></w:r></w:p><w:p>",
  "",
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_removeUnwantedHtmlTagsByRegex
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if( a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!text), "", a!localVariables( /* This rule works only when the html tags are balanced so removing the hidden tags first before replacing any other tags. */ local!textWithoutHiddenTag: rule!AS_GCM_removeHiddenSpanTagsFromHtml(text: ri!text), regexreplaceall( "", regexreplaceall( "()", regexreplaceall( "()", regexreplaceall( "]+>(
)?", regexreplaceall( "

", regexreplaceall( "

 " ), " " ), "" ), "" ), "" ) ) )

_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
= "<w:tblPr>
<w:tblStyle w:val='TableGrid'/>
<w:tblW w:w=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "auto" & char(34) & "/>
<w:tblBorders>
<w:top w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/>
<w:left w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/><w:bottom w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/><w:right w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/><w:insideH w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' v:color='auto'/><w:insideV w:val='single' w:sz='4' w:space='0' w:color='auto'/></w:tblBorders></w:tblPr>

5f18e821-865e-464d-b974-57c20096c58f.name: AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches

_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_handler

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetails
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  sort: ri!sort,
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!setId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  batchSize: ri!batchSize,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "relationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!relationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applywhen: ri!showInactive <> true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_groupTableRowDataIntoArray

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DSP_clauseRecordTitle

_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_insertTableCellforClauseTextTables
_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!width: 3116,
  "<w:tc><w:tcPr><w:tcW w:w=" & char(34) & local!width & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "dxa" & char(34) & "/><w:tcBorders><w:top w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/><w:bottom w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/><w:left w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/><w:right w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & " w:color=" & char(34) & "#000000" & char(34) & "/></w:tcBorders></w:tcPr><w:p><w:pPr><w:spacing w:after=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>" & "<w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & "center" & char(34) & " />" & "</w:pPr><w:r><w:t>" & ri!text & "</w:t></w:r></w:p></w:tc>"
)

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_insertTableRow

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection

_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetailsWithBatching
_a-0000e897-ddd7-8000-9c0c-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!relationIds: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!relationIds,
    default: index(
      rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
        entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
        pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(startIndex: 1, batchSize: - 1),
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "setId",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!setId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "isActive",
            operator: "=",
            value: true(),
            applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        },
        selectionColumns: { "relationId" },
        logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
        triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
        executeWhen: and(
          ri!executeWhen,
          or(
            any(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
              {
                ri!additionalFilters,
                ri!logicalExpression,
                ri!aggregation
              }
            ),
            a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!setId),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationIds)
          )
        )
      ).data,
      "relationId",
      {}
    )
  ),
  local!batches: rule!AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches(
    identifiers: local!relationIds,
    batchingSize: a!defaultValue(
      ri!batchingSize,
      cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_TINY
    ),
    returnType: ri!returnType,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo
  ),
  local!selectionColumns: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!selectionColumns,
    default: if(
      ri!onlyGetFieldsForWrite = true(),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
        array: {
          "relationId",
          "setId",
          "refClause.clauseId",
          "clauseTitle",
          "retainedClauseTitle",
          "alternateValue",
          "section",
          "refUsage.refDataId",
          "refUsage.refLabel",
          "refStatus.refDataId",
          "refAddedVia.refDataId",
          "effectiveDate",
          "validationAction",
          "retainedEffectiveDate",
          "refFormat.refDataId",
          "format.refDataId",
          "refReasonForRemoval",
          "justificationForRemoval",
          "isEditedViaEditClause",
          "isClauseUpdated",
          "isRemovedManually",
          "createdBy",
          "createdDatetime",
          "modifiedBy",
          "modifiedDatetime",
          "isActive",
          ri!selectAdditionalFieldsForWrite
        }
      ),
      {}
    )
  ),
  local!data: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!relationIds),
    {},
    a!flatten(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!batches,
        expression: if(
          and(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: local!selectionColumns),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!aggregation)
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_nullifyEmptyNestedCdtFields(
            cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
              type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause?list',
              value: rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
                entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
                entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause',
                returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
                pagingInfo: a!defaultValue(
                  value: ri!pagingInfo,
                  default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
                    startIndex: 1,
                    batchSize: count(fv!item.identifiers),
                    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "relationId", ascending: true())
                  )
                ),
                filters: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: "relationId",
                    operator: "in",
                    value: tointeger(fv!item.identifiers)
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: "isActive",
                    operator: "=",
                    value: true(),
                    applyWhen: ri!showInActive <> true()
                  ),
                  ri!additionalFilters
                },
                selectionColumns: local!selectionColumns,
                logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
                triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
                executeWhen: and(
                  ri!executeWhen,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers)
                )
              ).data
            )
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetails(
            relationId: fv!item.identifiers,
            returnType: a!defaultValue(
              value: ri!returnType,
              default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
            ),
            executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers),
            aggregation: ri!aggregation,
            logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
            additionalFilters: ri!additionalFilters,
            pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
            triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
            sort: ri!sort,
            showInActive: ri!showInActive
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType(
    data: local!data,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
    returnType: ri!returnType
  )
)

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_createDynamicSectionForClauses
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!clauseSetClauses: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetailsWithBatching(
    setId: ri!clauseSet.setId,
    showInactive: false(),
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!clauseSet.setId),
    selectionColumns: {
      "relationId",
      "clauseTitle",
      "alternateValue",
      "effectiveDate",
      "refClause.clauseId",
      "refClause.refFormat.refDataId",
      "refClause.clauseNumber",
      "section.sectionLabel",
      "section.sectionId",
      "refFormat.refDataId",
      "format.refDataId",
      "refClause.deviation",
      
    },
    batchingSize: cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_EXTRA_LARGE
  ),
  local!sections: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!clauseSetClauses),
    null,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_sortArrayDistinct(
      array: local!clauseSetClauses.section.sectionLabel,
      ascending: true()
    )
  ),
  local!clausesForDoc: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!clauseSetClauses),
    null,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_sortCdt(
      cdt: local!clauseSetClauses,
      field: "refClause.clauseNumber",
      ascending: true(),
      nullsFirst: true()
    )
  ),
  local!ibrClauses: rule!AS_GCM_UT_filterClauseSetClauseByFormat(
    clauseSetClause: local!clausesForDoc,
    format: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_FORMAT_IBR
  ),
  local!fullTextClauses: rule!AS_GCM_UT_filterClauseSetClauseByFormat(
    clauseSetClause: local!clausesForDoc,
    format: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_FORMAT_FULL_TEXT
  ),
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!sections),
    null,
    concat(
      "</w:t></w:r></w:p>",
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!sections,
        expression: {
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_defineHeadingforDocument(
            headingText: "" & " " & fv!item,
            headingType: "Heading2"
          ) & /* Create Reference Clauses table         */
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_addClausesTableToDocument(
            clauses: index(
              local!ibrClauses,
              wherecontains(
                fv!item,
                local!ibrClauses.section.sectionLabel
              ),
              {}
            ),
            bundle: local!bundle
          ) & concat(
            rule!AS_GCM_UT_createUCFClausesSectionforGenerateDoc(
              clauses: index(
                local!fullTextClauses,
                wherecontains(
                  fv!item,
                  local!fullTextClauses.section.sectionLabel
                ),
                {}
              ),
              bundle: local!bundle
            )
          )
        }
      ),
      "<w:p><w:r><w:t>"
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
    values: ri!value,
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: a!flatten(ri!cdt),
      field: ri!field,
      indexDefault: null
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_left
